quest.name: Small Size Advantage
journal:
î‚¾ Quest Sync
The combat concept observer has a test to run.
objectives: Speak with the combat concept observer.
Speak with the combat concept observer.
Speak with the combat concept observer once more.

dialogue.name: OBSERVER04296
dialogue.text: You're a familiar, aren't you? Have you any prowess in battle?

dialogue.name: OBSERVER04296
dialogue.text: Good. I could use your help with something.

dialogue.name: OBSERVER04296
dialogue.text: You see, I was asked to assess a one-eyed giant created as a facility guard, and so pit it against a lotis to test its fighting skills.

dialogue.name: OBSERVER04296
dialogue.text: Not only did the giant fall to a single blow, the lotis went into a frenzy and escaped...

dialogue.name: OBSERVER04296
dialogue.text: In my opinion, compact familiars like you are far more effective than these overly large brutes, and this is my chance to prove it. Do you think you can handle our runaway combatant?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: So long as there's something in it for me.

dialogue.name: OBSERVER04296
dialogue.text: Of course you'll be well rewarded for your efforts. Our experiment was conducted to the east, so that's as good a place as any to start looking for the lotis.

dialogue.name: OBSERVER04296
dialogue.text: There it is! It would seem the escaped lotis came back of its own accord.

dialogue.name: OBSERVER04296
dialogue.text: They usually feed off their foes to revitalize themselves, and I imagine it hungers after running amok like that.

dialogue.name: OBSERVER04296
dialogue.text: I'll take care of the situation here. The lotis is all yours.

dialogue.name: OBSERVER04296
dialogue.text: Don't worry about me. Just make sure that lotis doesn't cause any more trouble.

dialogue.name: OBSERVER04296
dialogue.text: You certainly made quick work of that lotis. I had a feeling I could count on you.

dialogue.name: OBSERVER04296
dialogue.text: As for the giant, it's far too heavy for us to move. I'll arrange for some broad-backed creations to haul it away after we return to Poieten Oikos.

dialogue.name: OBSERVER04296
dialogue.text: As I suspected, a smaller, more agile concept has far more facility for adapting to combat situations. Thank you for proving my theory.

dialogue.name: OBSERVER04296
dialogue.text: I'll be sure to keep your performance in mind the next time I design a familiar. Your reward, as promised.

obj.n: A Past, Not Yet Come to Pass
